entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
